snippet: Some legacy airlines are introducing minimum spending requirements and demanding that passengers fly farther to earn business and or first-class reward tickets.
lead_paragraph: Some legacy airlines are introducing minimum spending requirements and demanding that passengers fly farther to earn business and or first-class reward tickets.

headline.main: Frequent Flier Programs Tighten Rules for Membership
headline.print_headline: Frequent Flier Programs Tighten Rules for Membership
